required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of HRS9531 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Single- and Multiple-Ascending Dose Study in Healthy Subjects to Investigate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of Subcutaneous Administered HRS9531

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being conducted to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics, and pharmacodynamics of single and multiple subcutaneous injections of HRS9531 in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Start of Treatment to end of study (approximately 7 weeks or 9 weeks)
primary_outcome.description: A summary of adverse events, including Serious Adverse Events(SAEs)

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) of HRS9531
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Start of Treatment to end of study (approximately 7 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: AUC of HRS9531 after single subcutaneous injection

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Start of Treatment to end of study (approximately 7 weeks)
Start of Treatment to end of study (approximately 9 weeks)
secondary_outcome.description: AUC of HRS9531 after multiple subcutaneous injections

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Start of Treatment to end of study (approximately 9 weeks)
Start of Treatment to end of study (approximately 9 weeks)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Single dose escalation of HRS9531 injection in healthy subjects
Single dose of placebo in healthy adults
Multiple dose escalation of HRS9531 injection in healthy subjects
